Title: adidas TRAINING Believe This Primeblue Bra Women White GM2800
Description:
What will it be today? A long, hilly bike ride or three sets of tennis? Get your heart rate up in this adidas workout bra. The medium-support bra features AEROREADY and is designed to keep you dry and comfortable through your daily workout. Inner power mesh keeps you feeling supported. The keyhole back adds a stylish touch.
- Pullover design with round neck
